page.title: 10Wye college farm
page.content: Most of the land in our area especially all the land between Brook and Wye is owned by Wye College Farm. The grow all sorts of crops there, Wheat, oats, barley. oilseed rape, apples, hops,peas, beans,and maize. They use the farm to train the agricultural students and also they use it for experiments. They are experimenting to find wheat with short stalks. Most of the students live in Withersdane Hall or in houses in Wye village. Wye College own Withersdane Farm, Silks Farm and Court Lodge Farm in Brook.
